thread.title: Renata
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Renata

author: Renata
title: Renata
text: He immediately assisted me when I came in. Prior experiences with another lady did not go so well as I waited in the store for 25 minutes and she never assisted me. I ended up leaving the store and coming back when different associates were working. Jose save the day and closed the sale.
